titles.title: Mortgage Tax Cut Extension Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction for mortgage insurance premiums.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/5/2014--Introduced. Mortgage Tax Cut Extension Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2015 the tax deduction for mortgage insurance premiums.
